dialogue.speaker: Character
dialogue.text: I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I'm great too. What have you been up to?

dialogue.speaker: Character
dialogue.text: I've been working on a new project. It's really exciting!

dialogue.speaker: Character
dialogue.text: You know what? I think you'd be interested in it. Want to see it later?
